last_episode_to_air.name: Fangs without a Serpent
last_episode_to_air.overview: For the grand showdown, Abla coaches Caro to take the lead. Emotions run high as their risky plan unfolds and danger looms.

name: Abla Fahita: Drama Queen
overview: After disappearing from the limelight due to an ethical scandal, Abla Fahita falls victim to the ploy of a nightclub owner who seeks to exploit her, and when he is murdered under mysterious circumstances, Fahita soon becomes the prime suspect in the crime.

episodes.name: Work Kebab
episodes.overview: It's the anticipated opening night and Abla Fahita is starring, but a slip soon dethrones the diva, forcing her to pursue an unglamorous route.

episodes.name: Farewell Bonaparte
episodes.overview: In haste to flee the scene, Abla loses her kids. With Caro and Boudi stuck in the nightclub, Abla joins forces with an unexpected ally.

episodes.name: The Nono Ripens
episodes.overview: Determined to hunt for evidence, a disguised Abla returns to the scene while Caro, the nightclub's newest employee, finds her voice.

episodes.name: Gucci Double Semelle
episodes.overview: To unlock the next clues, Abla and Samah embark on a morbid mission. After becoming a viral sensation, Caro is faced with some tough decisions.

episodes.name: Hexadactyly
episodes.overview: In a further attempt to prove her innocence, Abla sets Amin up for an icy confession, while Caro navigates her stardom and seeks comfort from Ashwak.

episodes.name: Fangs without a Serpent
episodes.overview: For the grand showdown, Abla coaches Caro to take the lead. Emotions run high as their risky plan unfolds and danger looms.
